forum.latestCommentText: im on index and that way be the problem. other people can drop them in.

thread.title: when using smooth walk motion/teleport and being transorted

comments.text: in that situation there is an issue that often causes one to be transported in random ways. try for example in birbys lab, have smooth walking in, stand just out of reach of a door
button,  teleport/walk towards it and touch the button before finishing the smooth transition to replicate this issue.

thread.latestCommentText: button,  teleport/walk towards it and touch the button before finishing the smooth transition to replicate this issue.
